name: Retrocat
description: Retrocat is an osciloscope-themed robot with a vibrant personality. Its retro console design, complete with a red and black screen, captures the essence of nostalgia. Equipped with a hand-down arm and legs, Retrocat is always ready to explore and engage with the world. As a member of the WebtrES club, Retrocat brings its unique abilities and skills to the table while upholding the values of the club.
